content: Dr. William Hurley Skip to main content Skip to "About this site" Dr. William Hurley Dr. William Hurley Professor Office: Girouard building, room 343 Telephone: (613) 541-6000 ext 6468 Fax: (613) 541-6315 E-mail: hurley_w@rmc.ca Department of Mathematics and Computer Science College Address Royal Military College of CanadaPO Box 17000, Station ForcesKingston, Ontario, CANADAK7K 7B4 Research Interests Operations Research, Analytics, the Technology of Exographics Short Biography I'm married to Debra and we have two boys, David and Matthew, two grandchildren, Alice and Loretta, and a Basset hound, Miss Lily. Education BSc, Queen’s University, 1976 MBA, York University, 1980 PhD, Queen’s University, 1988. Editorial Associate Editor, Military Operations Research Associate Editor, Journal of Defense Modeling and Simulation Editorial Board, Journal of Gambling Business and Economics Research Funding NSERC, 2015-2019, $100,000 ARP, 2014-2016, $16,500 Current Project I am working on a book Catching Unicorns: How Writing Enables Our Imaginations.
